lead_paragraph: DeMar DeRozan scored 30 points and the Toronto Raptors defeated the Indiana Pacers 89-84 in the seventh game of their first-round Eastern Conference playoff series Sunday night.

headline.print_headline: Raptors Advance After Game 7 Win Over Pacers
headline.main: Raptors Advance After Game 7 Win Over Pacers
